name: form-radio
title: Form Radio
description: A radio input for selection of only one item.

options.name: model
options.description: A result of the selection. Can return object (see return-object attribute).

options.name: name
options.description: A name used to group radio buttons. Please make sure it is unique for each group.

options.name: custom
options.description: A custom styling overlying the default radio button.

options.name: return-object
options.description: If set to true, a full object will be returned in the model. By default only value is returned.
